name: HantavirusInfectionTestsForHantavirusNucleicAcid
title: Hantavirus Infection (Tests for Hantavirus Nucleic Acid)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Hantavirus nucleic acid.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component:  Hantavirus nucleic acid; 

LOINC search: ‘hanta nucleic’),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
